name: Optimost
overview:
Optimost, LLC provides software and services for Website testing and optimization. It offers A/B and multivariable testing solutions for testing Websites, including landing pages, sign-in and shopping basket pages, graphics and text, Web forms, product pages, and email campaigns. The company also provides creative authoring tool, a content delivery platform that displays permutation of pages, including layout changes eliminating the need for internal creative resources. In addition, it offers consulting services, as well as managed solution services, including test plans to test variables and values; development of strategic testing and content targeting plans; experimental design services that allows clients to realize the potential of tests and verify findings; analysis of test results and data; and frequent strategic plan reviews to analyze testing results and recommend future strategies. Optimost, LLC serves e-commerce and retail, financial services, media and entertainment, automobile and transportation, technology and software, travel and leisure, education and non-profit, healthcare and pharmaceuticals, manufacturing, real estate, telecommunications, business-to-business services, agencies, consultants, and marketing services industries.

The company was founded in 2001 and is based in San Jose, California. It has locations in New York, New York; London, the United Kingdom; and Tokyo, Japan. As of November 1, 2007, Optimost, LLC operates as a subsidiary of Interwoven Inc.
